author: Hannah Miller
title: North Carolina Gov. Roy Cooper orders residents to stay at home order amid coronavirus outbreak
description: North Carolina is the latest state to issue a stay-at-home order and close all nonessential businesses amidst the coronavirus outbreak.
content: North Carolina Gov. Roy Cooper issued a stay-at-home order Friday and closed the state's nonessential businesses in response to the COVID-19 outbreak. The order goes into effect 5:00 pm Monday, but Cooper urged residents to begin staying at home immediately.… [+1264 chars]
